00041 #define JPEG_QUALITY 25
00042 #undef RIMAGE_RGB32_JPEG_SENDING
00043 
00044 vector<ObjectDiff*> RImage::splitInDiffs(size_t maxBufferSize)
00045 {
00046 #if RIMAGE_RGB32_JPEG_SENDING
00047     if (type == RGB32) {
00048         SendPicture sp(buffer);
00049         sp.setsize(getWidth(), getHeight());
00050 
00051         LList<TransmissionUnit>* transmissionlist = sp.getZZ(JPEG_QUALITY, 1, 1);
00052         
00053         vector<ObjectDiff*> ret;
00054         LList <TransmissionUnit>::entry* trans_e;
00055         
00056         uint pnum = 0;
00057         for (trans_e = transmissionlist->first(); trans_e->next; trans_e = trans_e->next) {
00058             TransmissionUnit *transUnit = &(trans_e->x);
00059             RImageDiffJpegPacket* ridp = new RImageDiffJpegPacket(this);
00060             ridp->packetNumber = pnum++;
00061             for (int i = 0; i < transUnit->k; i++) {
00062                 ridp->data.push_back(transUnit->data[i]);
00063             }
00064             ret.push_back(ridp);
00065         }
00066         
00067         return ret;
00068     }
00069     else {
00070         RImageDiffRect* bigDiff = new RImageDiffRect(this, 0, 0, getWidth(), getHeight());
00071         vector<ObjectDiff*> ret = bigDiff->split(maxBufferSize);
00072         delete bigDiff;
00073         return ret;
00074     }
00075 #else
00076     RImageDiffRect* bigDiff = new RImageDiffRect(this, 0, 0, getWidth(), getHeight());
00077     vector<ObjectDiff*> ret = bigDiff->split(maxBufferSize);
00078     delete bigDiff;
00079     return ret;
00080 #endif
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool RImage::applyDiff(const ObjectDiff* diff)
00084 {
00085     const RImageDiffRect* rectDiff = dynamic_cast<const RImageDiffRect*>(diff);
00086     if (rectDiff) {
00087         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Diff applying of RImage diff rect is not implemented");

00089         uint8_t** rpx = rectDiff->rows;
00090         for (int y = 0; y < rectDiff->rectHeight; y++) {
00091             for (int x = 0; x < rectDiff->rectWidth; x++) {
00092                 for (int i = 0; i < getBytesPerPixel(type); i++) {
00093                     rows[y+rectDiff->rectTop][(x+rectDiff->rectLeft)*getPixelSize()+i] =
00094                         rpx[y][x*getPixelSize()+i];
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         return true;*/
00100         return false;
00101     }
00102     const RImageDiffPoints* pointsDiff = dynamic_cast<const RImageDiffPoints*>(diff);
00103     if (pointsDiff) {
00104         setSizeAndType(rectDiff->refImageWidth, rectDiff->refImageHeight, rectDiff->refImageType);
00105         if (getType() == RImage::C8) {
00106             for (size_t i = 0; i < pointsDiff->points.size(); i++) {
00107                 buffer[pointsDiff->points[i].y * this->width + pointsDiff->points[i].x] = pointsDiff->colorsC8[i];
00108             }
00109         }
00110         return true;
00111     }
00112 /*  const RImageDiffJpegPacket* jpegPacket = dynamic_cast<const RImageDiffJpegPacket*>(diff);
00113     if (jpegPacket) {
00114         if (jpegPacket->id == jpegCache.currentId) {
00115             jpegCache.pushPacket(jpegPacket);
00116         }
00117         else if (jpegPacket->id > jpegCache.currentId) {

00121         }
00122         // otherwise, it is an old packet: drop it
00123     }*/
